infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to let wedding guests take photos to share with Adam & Courtney.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to let wedding guests select photos to share with Adam & Courtney.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may need microphone access for video recording features.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Adam & Courtney Wedding app to access your photos to share wedding memories.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Adam & Courtney Wedding app to access your camera to capture wedding memories.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Adam & Courtney Wedding app to access your photo library to save wedding memories.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Adam & Courtney Wedding app to save wedding photos to your device.
